title: Bloomberg Markets: Thornburg's Browne on Investing in FANGs
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Thornburg's Browne on Investing in FANGs
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Connor Browne Portfolio Manager Thornburg Investment Management Discussing investing in tech stocks, saying the biggest companies are winning most of the market.
